PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05322021-06-10TC,  CRA,  LAB,  NRCAN,  NR,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectVessel Safety Certificates Regulations
PrecisVESSEL SAFETY CERTIFICATES REGULATIONS (VCR) in order to (1) clarify or modernize existing regulatory requirements; (2) update the VCR to better align with the CANADA SHIPPING ACT, 2001 (CSA 2001); and (3) correct minor technical discrepancies identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0135 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
